name: Harry will not use Expelliarmus on his classmates.
Harry will not use Potions on his classmates.
Harry will not sneak out to Hagrid's cottage.
Ron will not miss his classes.
Ron will not get jealous of Harry.
Hermione will not use the Time Turner.
Hermione will not slap Malfoy in the face.
Hermione will not brew Polyjuice Potions.
Draco will not threaten to tell his father about this.
Luna will not talk about the nargles.
Cedric will not make fun of Harry Potter.
